video._description: Kara Goucher running in the new Altra Paradigm 6.

customhtml2_11446045._customHTML:
THE PARADIGM 6:
NOT YOUR DAD'S SUPPORT SHOE™

video._description: A 360-degree video of the new Altra Paradigm 6.

text._text: MAKE ROOM FOR A BETTER RUN

customhtml2_copy._customHTML:
Altra Elite Athlete and two-time Olympian, Kara Goucher, shared her thoughts on how to improve her favorite shoe. We listened.

The result? The Altra Paradigm 6.

image._alt: Kara Goucher in the new Altra Paradigm 6, standing in front of mountains. A quote to the right says "This shoe has a lot of personality... it makes me excited to put it on."

customhtml2_copy_cop._customHTML:
IN A CATEGORY OF ITS OWN

The industry standard support shoes tend to be “big” and blocky. The Paradigm 6 fits more like an everyday trainer with “springiness” and “pop.”

image._alt: Shot or rear portion of Altra Paradigm 6, showing the Ego Max sole.

customhtml2_copy_cop_229667436._customHTML:
ALTRA EGO™ MAX

New Altra EGO™ MAX midsole for our most plush and bouncy ride, with added durability.

customhtml2_copy._customHTML:
GUIDERAIL™
GuideRail™ designed to provide extra medial support only when it’s needed.

image._alt: Shot or instep portion of Altra Paradigm 6, showing the Innovarch

customhtml2_copy_cop_229667436._customHTML:
INNOVARCH™

Updated InnovArch™ arch feature encourages better foot placement in each step.

customhtml2_copy._customHTML:
INNERFLEX™
Grid-like grooves in the midsole designed to improve flexibility and natural movement.

customhtml2_copy_cop._customHTML:
BEHIND THE DESIGN

Collaboration is key. That's why we worked with Kara on every detail of the Paradigm 6, from color to comfort, performance, and design.

video._description: Kara Goucher - behind the design of the Paradigm 6
video._name: Kara Goucher - behind the design of the Paradigm 6

image._alt: Kara Goucher running during a sunset with the words "I love the way it feels, I love that it kept me healthy, I love that I can train in it."
Kara Goucher running with an overlay of the Altra Footshape design

customhtml2._customHTML:
ALTRA FOOTSHAPE™ COMFORT

Our signature FootShape™ comfort gives your feet more space to sit naturally and is designed to address biological differences in men's and women's feet.

content._jcr:description: The Altra Paradigm 6 is a support shoe without the bulk. We worked with Altra Elite Athlete Kara Goucher to bring you an everyday trainer that’s ready to run.
content._jcr:title: Paradigm 6
